resources.string: Start calculating your discount now! Enter the starting price and discount amount to find the final price.

This app is a simple discount calculator that allows users to calculate the final price of a product after a discount has been applied. The user can enter the initial price of the of the product as well as select a predefined discount (25%, 50%, or 75%) or enter a custom discount. 

The application will calculate the final price of the based on the user input and display the result. In addition, application also provides a notification if there is an error in the user input such as the such as an empty starting price or invalid discount format. With a simple and easy-to-use interface, this application is suitable used to assist users in calculating product prices with discounts quickly and efficiently. 

This application was created for Assessment 1 
Mobpro 1.
